roleset.name: dissent to
roleset.note: DISAPPROVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disapprove' based on transformation of 'approve'frames. No actual usage examined. Verbnet entry 31.3, Framenet entryJudgement. (from disapprove.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: NP disapproval
example.text: Shareholders disapproved Pacific First Financial's acquisition by Royal Trustco Ltd of Toronto for $27 a share, or $212 million.
example.arg: Pacific First Financial's acquisition by Royal Trustco Ltd of Toronto for $27 a share, or $212 million.

example.name: PP disapproval
example.text: 50% of voters disapprove of the President's job performance.
